data.name: Project META Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the free Combat Demo for Project META!!!

Project META is a Physics-Based, Superpower, Combat-Heavy, VR Game!
Become the Hero of your dreams, as you mix and match fantastic superpowers in different combinations and take on Ninjas, Robots, Gangs, Mutants, Aliens, and more!


{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Super_Strength_-_Shortest_Clip.gif

    [/h2]
  • Fight, fly, swing, shoot, and smash your way through physics-based ragdoll enemies!
  • Collect new abilities, weapons, and items to develop your own personal combat style!
  • Switch power sets on the fly to create an infinite number of unique combos!
  • Grab an enemy Robot, throw it into the air, jet boost after him, and then punch him through a wall, before grappling him back to you for another round!
  • Destructible Objects! Use the environment to smash your enemies through walls, floors, and a ton of breakable items.
  • Future updates will include additional powers, enemies, levels, challenges, storylines, events, and more!

The game will be out in Early Access later this year, but I created this demo to give everyone a preview of what's to come.

Included In This Demo

    [/h2]Multiple Power Sets to Mix and Match:
  • Strength: Use your enhanced physique to climb almost everything, or toss your enemies into the air.
  • Flames: Fly through the skies, throw flames, or breathe fire down on your foes!
  • Spider: Swing through the city, or grapple enemies and objects towards you.
  • Laser Fists: Physically PUNCH forward to fire different lasers from your fists!
  • Energy Weapons: Summon swords and shields made of energy to give you the edge in physical combat.
  • Healing, Enemy Tracking, and more!

Multiple Enemy Types, all with Full Physics Ragdolls
  • Robots!
  • Ninjas!
  • Masked Agents!

Three unique environments to explore:

    [/h2]
  • Apartment Complex and Ancient Asian City: Two combat sandboxes where you can fight waves of enemies in close quarters.
  • Millennium City, a smaller example of future open world cities where you can climb, swing, and fly around a large urban environment, while spawning enemies at various points.

Please keep in mind that everything is still in development, so expect some bugs and things that still need to be updated.

Don't forget to join the Discord server, where you can post ideas, suggestions, bugs, and gameplay videos!

Thanks again for playing, I hope you enjoy it, and I look forward to making this an incredible game.

Add Project META to your Steam Wishlist!

data.short_description: Project META is a Physics-Based, Superpower, Combat-Focused, VR Game! Become the Hero of your dreams, as you mix and match fantastic superpowers in different combinations and take on Ninjas, Robots, Gangs, Mutants, Aliens, and more!
